statements: DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 1 AND tissue_type = 'Brain';
DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE condition = 'Healthy' AND expression_level > 10.0;
DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name LIKE 'ABC%' AND condition = 'Cancer';
DELETE FROM tissue_data WHERE gene_id = 100 AND expression_level > 5.0;
DELETE FROM tissue_data WHERE tissue_id IN (SELECT tissue_id FROM tissue_data WHERE gene_id = 200);
DELETE FROM ExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 1 AND tissue_id = 2 AND condition_id = 3;
DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' AND expression_level > 10.0;
DELETE FROM TissueInfo WHERE tissue_name = 'Brain' OR description LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM ConditionData WHERE condition_name = 'Healthy' AND condition_description IS NULL;
